page.title: 03Wimbledon Park:a suburb
page.content: The suberb around Wimbledon Park is partly in the borough of Merton and partly in Wandworth.It has as its centre a quiet shopping street which supplies all the everyday needs of the lacal people.There are no buses except along the main road at the foot of the hill so the Tube station is very busy with commuters and schoolchildren in the morning and again in the evening. There are new offices near the station for solicitors, estate agents, accountants, insurance brokers and one is a shipping office. On either side, there are long narrow strrets of terraced houses built in the late 19th century. Few houses have front gardens. Parked cars are everywhere. Higher in the hill,near the Park, there are newer detached houses with lovely gardens.
